main event: One unidentified flying object was reported by a civilian in Perry, Georgia on 18 August 1966.
interesting points: The sighting occurred approximately at 2030 hours on 18 August 1966., The object appeared to change shape from a semi-circle to a ball., The object was described as bright orange and was observed for approximately seven minutes., The observer was a 45-year-old supply clerk at Robins AFB with limited knowledge in astronomy., No physical evidence or photographs were captured of the sighting.
witness description: Civilian, age 45, supply clerk, Robins AFB
